content: These tips sound great, and I'll definitely incorporate them into my training. I was also wondering if you could recommend some good stretches for my IT band, as I've had issues with that in the past. By the way, speaking of charity events, I participated in the "Run for Hunger" charity event last month, and it was amazing to see so many people come together to support a great cause. I managed to raise $250 in donations, which was way more than I expected!
